parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT i.*, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale FROM invoices i LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON i.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE i.id = '" + $json.invoiceId + "' AND i.tenant_id = '" + $json.tenantId + "';" }}
={{ "SELECT * FROM invoice_lines WHERE invoice_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.invoiceId + "' ORDER BY ordre ASC;" }}
={{ "SELECT id FROM exercices_comptables WHERE tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND cloture = false ORDER BY date_debut DESC LIMIT 1;" }}

={{ "SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_piece FROM 'EC-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM ecritures_comptables WHERE tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND numero_piece LIKE 'EC-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-%';" }}

={{ "INSERT INTO ecritures_comptables (id, tenant_id, exercice_id, journal_code, numero_piece, date_ecriture, libelle, reference_doc, source_auto, source_id, statut) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '" + $json.tenantId + "', '" + $json.exerciceId + "', 'VE', '" + $json.numeroPiece + "', '" + $json.dateEcriture + "', '" + $json.libelle.replace(/'/g, "''") + "', '" + $json.referenceDoc + "', 'facture', '" + $json.invoiceId + "', 'validee') RETURNING id, numero_piece;" }}

={{ "INSERT INTO lignes_ecritures (id, ecriture_id, numero_compte, libelle_ligne, debit, credit, ordre) VALUES
(gen_random_uuid(), '" + $('10. Insert Ecriture').first().json.id + "', '411000', 'Client - ' || '" + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.referenceDoc + "', " + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.montantTtc + ", 0, 0),
(gen_random_uuid(), '" + $('10. Insert Ecriture').first().json.id + "', '" + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.compteProduit + "', 'Produit HT - ' || '" + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.referenceDoc + "', 0, " + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.montantHt + ", 1),
(gen_random_uuid(), '" + $('10. Insert Ecriture').first().json.id + "', '445710', 'TVA collectée - ' || '" + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.referenceDoc + "', 0, " + $('09. Build Ecriture').first().json.tva + ", 2)
RETURNING id, numero_compte, debit, credit;" }}
